verbs.description: [ARG1: another catholic priest] [V: placed] [ARG2: on administrative leave the diocese] said in a statement on their website that after receiving an abuse complaint against father michael p juran bishop richard j malone has placed father juran on administrative leave as an investigation continues michael p juran buffalo bishop richard malone buffalo catholic diocese catholic diocese of buffalo jackie joy michael p juran priest n y buffalo new york victim assistance coordinator siobhan oconnor buffalo siobhan o'connor
